alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Lee; Magoffin; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 9:26PM EDT until July 18 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Magoffin County in southeastern Kentucky... East central Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 926 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fivemile, or over Jackson, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Noctor around 930 PM EDT. Stevenson around 935 PM EDT. Cornelia around 940 PM EDT. Foraker around 945 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Mason and Marshallville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
